content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Hello, thank you for considering my apartment. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains and would appreciate a fair and competitive rental price. What would you be willing to offer for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would need more time to think about it, I would like to see some more pictures of the apartment and get a feel for the neighborhood. I can make an offer next week after I have had a chance to review everything.
name: Bo Li

content: I understand, thank you for taking the time to consider my apartment. I will send you some additional pictures and information about the neighborhood as soon as possible. I look forward to hearing your offer next week.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month. Can we sign a lease today?
name: Bo Li

content: I appreciate your offer, but I'm afraid I am not able to accept it at this time. As a landlord, I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains. I will need to consider other offers before making a decision. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. Please let me know if you would like to continue the negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine
